column2: ggplot(data = dados_hemi_v1, aes(logExposedArea_age_decay, 1/2 * logAvgThickness_age_decay + logTotalArea_age_decay , color = Diagnostic, fill = Diagnostic, alpha = 0.4)) +
theme_pubr()+ labs(y = "1/2 log(AvgThickness) + log(TotalArea) (after age correction)", x = "log(ExposedArea) (after age correction)" )
